lines: 1. Dhoranga polo yawore, Wayud kinde mar nenoLer moa e msalap Yesu, Manyisowa herane.
Ng`wono maduong`, miwuoro ngang`,Kaka rangano yaworena;Ni an, ni an, Oyawore ni an.
2. Rangano pod oyawore Ni joma richo duto,Madongo gi matindo be, Magombo yudo warruok.
3. Watimuru kinda koro, Wayie ng`wono maduong`no;Kwating`o msalaba koro, Wanayudi osimbo.
4. Ka wasekalo aora, To wanawe msalaba;Ruoth nomiwa ngima mak rum, Wanahere mochwere.
